form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: United States Department of Justice Immigration and Naturalization Service

full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/18/2023 Form I-391 (Rev. 9-5-56) UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Immigration and Naturalization Service 70 Columbus Ave., New York 23, N.Y Please refer to this File Number A10 294 862 Date: JUL 17 1957 Mr. NG LIN 40 Division Street New York, N.Y. Dear Sir: You are hereby notified that the conditions of the bond described below, on which you are surety, have been fulfilled as to the person named below, and you are therefore no longer liable thereunder as to said person. Date Amount Bond Form No. September 26 1956 $1,000. I-353 Name of alien! MAR DOO aka MAR AU SANG Please call at the bond office, 6th floor, on or before JUL 3 1 1957 Receipt Form I-300. excepting Saturdays and Sundays, to collect your bond. Bring with you Respectfully, EDWARD J. SHAUGHNESSY District Director CC: Haskell R. Barst, Esq., Frank A. Russo 60 Broad Street Administrative Assistant New York, N.Y.
